q: how to create a list with joined bulletpoints (eg: linkedin in the experience section)?
how to make a variable uppercase in LaTeX?
a: define a second variable with the uppercase verison of the first one: \FOO{\expandafter\uppercase\expandafter{\foo}}

q: fix "could not register service workers invalidstateerror" in vscode
a: kill all vscode instances and restart, maybe open the notebook in a regular vscode instead of insiders.
